overview_of_class: This class will build on the first quarter of the sequence, strengthening students' abilities to communicate complex ideas in Persian and engage with authentic Persian language materials. The second quarter of the sequence will be organized around the quatrains of Khayyam; we will read them in Persian, as well as secondary literature in Persian and in English; we will discuss the ethical ethos embodied in these poems, debate Khayyam's religious views, and research the history of Khayyam's reception in the West.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: PERS 121-1 or permission of the instructor

descriptions.name: Teaching Method
descriptions.value: The class is focused on communication in Persian; vocabulary and grammar will be taught in context, as a tool for communication and understanding.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: Weekly quizzes combined five project-based assessments
